channel.title: Clash of the Titans
channel.description:
Release date will be around [b]2 April 2010 (USA)[/b] [b]Australia 1 April 2010 [b][/b]Canada 2 April 2010[/b]
Yay! no fully animated scenes!
Features all the greek gods from Zues down to Poseidon. Even Medusa.
and whats that I hear? the movie will be followed by a game?
[b]Plot:[/b] The mortal son of the god Zeus embarks on a perilous journey to stop the underworld and its minions from spreading their evil to Earth as well as the heavens.
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clash_of_the_Titans_(2010_film)]More Information[/url]

item.title: Clash of the Titans
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I watched this in Boston, when I was on a school trip.

Easily one of the worst movies I have ever seen. I seriously fell asleep for about 25mins at the end, just 'cause I was so sick of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Clash of the Titans
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

It’s a good movie but a totally flawed representation of the Greek mythology. Djinn language sounds cool.

item.title: Clash of the Titans
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:11, topic:333749”][quote author=Baros Rocks link=topic=430153.msg3312288#msg3312288 date=1282066801]
I’ve only seen the 1981 version, that was pretty cool. Obviously you’d expect the visual effects to be bad but in the 1981 version they really are terrible.
[/quote]Probably better than this version, here they sacrificed literarily EVERYTHING for visual effects. A good balance is the key, sadly very few directors manage to do that nowadays.[/quote]

this

item.title: Clash of the Titans
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Ok i’ve seen this piece of dogshit now, Most of it was pure junk. The storyline was like taken from a 13 yr olds schoolbook and the acting was incredibly terrible for the most part (you could really tell they weren’t into the actual script themselves). As i suspected, the only thing they spent the cash on was visual effects, everything else was pure shit basically.

On a scale from 0 to 100 i give this movie a -200.

Read full topic

item.title: Clash of the Titans
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“mr arrows95, post:7, topic:333749”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=430153.msg3159910#msg3159910 date=1269442162]
I really hope they don’t do the same as they did with Sherlock Holmes. They use great characters, they strip everything from the story and put in explosion after explosion.
[/quote]I also hope they dont do that. I hated that movie because of it

It tended to lewk` and idiots[/quote]Then why on earth would you hate it???

Read full topic

item.title: Clash of the Titans
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Speljohan:

I’m pretty sure it will be shit because new movies tend to value visuals and overused clichés above storyline and compelling acting.

Legendary Pictures is the shit though, if anyone can do it well, it’s them.
